aboutpara: A newly trained MERN stack engineer, I bring a diverse skill set to the table, having previously run a successful printing business and worked in retail. My background in Architectural Technology has also equipped me with a strong foundation in CAD. As a MERN stack engineer, I have developed expertise in building dynamic, scalable web applications using MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, and NodeJS.

resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.bullets: Next.js · GraphQL · HTML5 · React Native · REST APIs · Express.js · Redux.js · MongoDB · Node.js · JavaScript · Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) · Full-Stack Development · HTML · React.js
Photography Printing, Updating Website & Social Media, Customer Service, Accounting
